scripts.install:all: npm run install:services && npm run install:shared
scripts.install:services: for dir in services/*; do (cd "$dir" && npm install); done
scripts.dev: concurrently --prefix-colors='cyan,magenta,green,yellow,blue,red,white,gray' --prefix='[{name}]' --names='user-service,post-service,comment-service,chat-service,media-service,notification-service,analytics-service,search-service' 'cd services/user-service && bun run dev' 'cd services/post-service && bun run dev' 'cd services/comment-service && bun run dev' 'cd services/chat-service && bun run dev' 'cd services/media-service && bun run dev' 'cd services/notification-service && bun run dev' 'cd services/analytics-service && bun run dev' 'cd services/search-service && bun run dev'
scripts.build:services: for dir in services/*; do (cd "$dir" && npm run build); done
scripts.test:services: for dir in services/*; do (cd "$dir" && npm test); done
scripts.db:generate: for dir in services/*; do (cd "$dir" && npm run db:generate); done
scripts.db:migrate: for dir in services/*; do (cd "$dir" && npm run db:migrate); done
scripts.db:seed: for dir in services/*; do (cd "$dir" && npm run db:seed); done
